title: Which college is better, PGIMS Rohtak or AIIMS Jodhpur? - Quora
tags: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)

response.answer_text: Pgims rohtak is better Aiims jodhpur is not like aiims delhi Pgims rohtak is the most prestigious medical institute of haryana Pgims is having better infrastructure and better faculty and education than aiims jodhpur If someone do mbbs from pgims will get benefits when he/she peruse their pg curses from same pgims college While aiims jodhpur is not having that much seats and till now haven't started its surgical,medicine,etc seats Only benefit of aiims jodhpur is that you will have a mbbs degree with aiims written on it

I already mentioned in my last answer no college is better than others, USA has worlds best Universities and Colleges but Indian professional is rocking there. Its about students who make the Institute better or worst. I
